programme.desc: Enjoy a the sights and sounds of a glowing fire for 5 hours in Parts 1 and 2 of Crackling Fireplace - Available in 4k resolution.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: Winona Ryder vs. Johnny Depp
programme.desc: S1: E10 Johnny Depp’s trial with Amber Heard had everyone talking, but wait until you hear about Winona Ryder’s. Johnny experienced love at first sight and became obsessed with Winona. But after their breakup, Winona dealt with mental health issues and her own very public trial, which has some striking similarities with Johnny and Ambers. Everyone thought she was a crazy, and the aftermath of her court case left her banished from the world. Winona went through a great awakening outside of the public eye and bounced back into Hollywood.

programme.title: Nicole Kidman vs. Tom Cruise
programme.desc: S1:E9 Was Scientology the reason why Tom Cruise divorced Nicole Kidman? Nicole was obsessed with Tom. She tried to do everything she could to be with the superstar at all times. But Tom had another obsession: Scientology. Then, when Tom Cruise suddenly divorced Nicole, the world she thought she was living in shattered into a million pieces. Was it because of Scientology? Was it the multiple miscarriages she had? Was it the wiretap Tom allegedly put on Nicole? This story was so uncovered, that our team had to dig deep to get the details.

programme.title: Jennifer Aniston vs. Brangelina
programme.desc: S1:E12 For almost 20 years, the media portrayed Jennifer Aniston as a heartbroken woman who would never be happy until she had kids. That couldn’t be further from the truth. Our team uncovered details that will prove Brad and Jennifer were the perfect Hollywood couple everybody adored, until Brad suddenly left Jen for Angelina Jolie. This story is so much bigger than Brangelina.

programme.title: Anna Faris vs. Chris Pratt
programme.desc: S1:E6 If Chris Pratt didn’t have an affair with Jennifer Lawrence, why did he file for divorce From Anna Faris? Chris Pratt and Anna Faris were the famous, ideal couple the world couldn’t get enough of. But when Chris Pratt skyrocketed into superstardom, Anna felt more and more insecure. Then, rumors of Chris having an affair with co-star Jennifer Lawrence emerged. Even though they both deny having an affair, Chris and Annas sudden divorce, fallout of their personal lives, and the health of their son caused a media frenzy that our team got to the bottom of.

programme.title: Katy Perry vs. Russell Brand
programme.desc: S1:E7 Katy Perry is no stranger to toxic relationships. She finally thought she landed the perfect one with bad boy comedian Russell Brand, only for him to divorce her through text message right in the middle of her world tour 2 years later. Our team uncovered the full story of the turbulent aftermath and the journey she went on to become a strong, authentic person who was finally able to fully embrace a healthy relationship.

programme.title: The Rise Of Fredia Gibbs
programme.desc: S1:E6 Fredia Gibbs was the first female African American kickboxing world champion who learned how to fight as a child because she grew up scared and afraid. It wasn’t until she unknowingly got into a van alone after a party with a man who turned out to be a serial killer, that all the years of fighting and training would help her unleash the power she had inside of her and catapult her to new heights.

programme.title: The Rise of Charity Witt
programme.desc: S1:E5 Dubbed The Worlds Strongest Barbie, Charity suffered a heart attack when she was only 17 years old, due to being overworked and poor life choices. This health crisis lead her to change her mindset by taking action on changing her life, that put her on a path that lead her to becoming an elite powerlifter, a Strongwoman competitor, a winner of the Titan Games and escaping an abusive relationship.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: Mia Kang The Woman That I Am
programme.desc: Overweight as a child, Mia Kang suffered bullying and a far from ideal childhood. Desperate to lose weight and feel good about herself, Mia began starving herself at the young age of 13. She lost a lot of weight very quickly and this launched her into the modeling industry which continued to destroy her self-esteem and health, until a vacation in Thailand, and her discovery of Muay Thai changed her life forever.

programme.title: Katie Piper Unbreakable Beauty
programme.desc: Pursuing the model lifestyle in London, Katie was used to gaining attention for her looks. But when her stalker Danny Lynch hired a hitman to attack Katie, her face was destroyed and she became completely unrecognizable. It should’ve been the end of her career dreams, but Katie’s revenge turned into an inspiring rise to fame. Now, THIS is how you make a comeback!﻿

programme.title: The Kardashian Redemption - The Unauthorized Documentary
programme.desc: When OJ Simpson destroyed her family, Kim Kardashian avenged her father, Robert Kardashian.

programme.title: Oprah Prison Of the Past
programme.desc: This one important person in Oprah Winfreys life wanted nothing to do with her until she was famous. Years later, Oprah is forced to confront her. Before you live a life of regret, listen to Oprah’s story

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: Escape These 11 Tax Traps and You ll Save in Retirement

Joe Anderson, CFP, and Big Al Clopine, CPA outline 11 tax traps and the escape routes thatll help you keep more of your money in retirement, when you need it most."

programme.title: The Problem With Laughing At Poor People
programme.desc: "I cant believe I have to say it you shouldnt laugh at poor people But doing exactly that has become one of the most popular content genres in personal finance, and even if you are the one doing the laughing its still probably costing you money. So its time to learn How Money Works to find out the problems with laughing at poor people yes really"

programme.title: Working From Home Why Entry Level Jobs are Not Entry Level
programme.desc: According to study after study, working from home leads to more efficient workers, less staff turnover, higher quality work, it’s cheaper for workers AND it’s cheaper for the business. Before Covid-19 high tech companies were already experimenting with the advantages of remote work. A peer reviewed report from an unidentified NASDAQ listed company ran a trial where half of their call center workforce was randomly selected to work from home and the other half would remain in the office. The group given the opportunity to work from home had higher customer satisfaction, took thirteen percent more calls and suffered fifty percent less staff attrition which is a big issue for call centers which typically struggle with high staff turnover. A follow up study done on workers in a wider selection of roles including finance, marketing and software development had similar results. They compared staff working full time from the office with staff working hybrid schedules from home and the office. That study found that hybrid workers were eight percent more efficient at their jobs and had turnover rates thirty five percent lower than staff working in the office full time. If businesses want to get the most out of their workers the results are clear, more work from home is more better… Working from home is also cheaper for the business. Office space is expensive to rent or buy. Companies that want all their workers in the office will pay more for utilities like electricity, maintenance, security and internet that workers would happily pay for themselves if they were allowed to work from home. It’s rare that companies turn down better results for less money but in this case there are four reasons that more are demanding their staff come back to the office. The first reason is that a lot of companies are not doing so well right now, interest rates are high, investors are not throwing money around like they were in 2020 and companies need to make cuts. The easiest and largest ongoing expense for most companies are their employees

programme.title: Expensive Retirements Life Insurance and Kathy Ireland
programme.desc: Sailing off into the sunset could mean a very expensive retirement...Ric Edelman explains why; Who really needs life insurance? And an interview with Kathy Ireland - how she went from being a super model to a super mogul.

programme.title: Investment Choices Saving for a House and Global Tech
programme.desc: Investment advisor Ric Edelman discusses which type of investment is appropriate for you; explains when to start saving for a house vs. when to buy; interviews Salim Ismail about why investors need to think globally about technology breakthroughs; and Jean Edelman shows us how change is good.

programme.title: Your Money Your Wealth DIY One-Page Financial Plan
programme.desc: What one thing can you do today to change the course of your financial future? Having a written financial plan for retirement dramatically increases the chances youll reach your goals. Yet only 33 of Americans have one!Were breaking down all the barriers to help you create a basic written financial plan,the overlap of things that are both actually important, and actually controllable. A One-Page Financial Plan helps distinguish these things.

programme.title: When to Claim Social Security and the Truth About Annuities
programme.desc: "When should Richie and Heather in Idaho and Rebecca and Sam in Virginia collect their Social Security benefits? Why is Dan s benefit so much higher than his wife s? Plus, P. Ware has a Roth conversion case for claiming Social Security AFTER age 70, and Jerry in Phoenix wonders how Donald Trump s plan to stop taxing Social Security could impact claiming strategies. That s today on Your Money, Your Wealth podcast number 509. Plus, Joe is checking back in as he rants - I mean, spitballs - on Rebecca and Sam s $1 million single premium deferred indexed annuity. The fellas also spitball on their Roth conversion and retirement strategy, and how much is too much when it comes to advisor fees."

programme.title: The Decline of Manufacturing Jobs And Why They Still Matter
programme.desc: "Manufacturing jobs have fallen by more than a third due to offshoring, automation, and the shift to service work. In this episode, we explore why these jobs disappeared, why they’re now seen in a new light, and what it means for the future of the American workforce."

programme.title: Why Do Tech Companies Hire and Fire So Much
programme.desc: "The big tech companies have been on a firing spree in the past six month. Googles parent company Alphabet recently announced that they would be cutting 12,000 jobs globally, Microsoft has already laid off 10,000 workers, and Amazon is getting rid of 18,000 workers the largest job cut in the companys 29-year history. Those are just the companies that are doing well Facebook is laying off 13 of its workforce because their big play on the metaverse has failed to excite investors and then there is twitter which laid off half of its workforce and then hired some of them back and then fired them again. Times are tough for businesses and executives are being pressured by investors to make cuts wherever they can. The easiest and quickest way for businesses to save on expenses is to cut out new projects and lay off the staff working on them. There three reasons that tech companies in particular hire so many people and three reasons why they fire so many people just as quickly. The first reason they had so many employees to begin with is because the largest employers in the tech space have been on a diversification spree. The largest tech companies (with the exception of Amazon which employs a large amount of workers in its distribution centers) can run with much smaller crews than they currently do. Software is highly scalable, a single developer can produce an application that is downloaded by millions of people, which is impossible for any other type of business. Compare a company like Meta to a Company like Walmart and the difference is clear, Walmart has a similar market cap but employs twenty-five times as many staff, mostly in its stores and warehouses across the country. The only other industry that comes close is the pharmaceutical industry with research and development teams that create medicines that can be mass produced once they get through the FDA approval process. However, companies like Microsoft, Meta, Alphabet, Amazon and Apple have all hired a lot of extra staff that they dont need to run their busines

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

programme.title: Spotlight - Eden Energy
programme.desc: Join EDEN as they step on stage with a simple message. With EDEN waste will power the future. EDEN systems convert mixed carbon based waste into: • clean electricity • clean fuels • bio and hydrochar for soil • recoverable grey water Waste is no longer a liability, it is now an asset. The solution to pollution is here and EDEN will be restored.

programme.title: WARNING: These Crypto Firms May Be Headed For DISASTER
programme.desc: Tom Lee, chairman of BitMine, says the crypto treasury firm bubble may have already burst as many trade below NAV, reflecting investor skepticism... could we see some of the top treasury firms collapse this cycle?

programme.title: Bitcoin Jesus: The Prosecution of Roger Ver
programme.desc: They call him “Bitcoin Jesus,” though he despises the nickname. His real name is Roger Ver. At any moment, Roger could be arrested for alleged tax evasion and mail fraud. But anyone familiar with his case knows the truth: Roger’s only “crime” was being the very first investor and passionate advocate for Bitcoin. For that, he faces 109 years in federal prison. As devastating as this is for Roger, this case is less about him and more about you.

programme.title: Memecoins on Bitcoin!
programme.desc: What if trading Bitcoin memecoins was as easy as logging in with your wallet and clicking “go”? This week, we’re pleased to welcome Bob Bodily, CEO of Toniq Labs, to discuss the platform that’s turning that vision into reality. No gas fees, no headaches, just fast and simple memecoin creation and trading that could change the game for all memecoins. From the Internet Computer to Bitcoin, Toniq Labs has been pushing boundaries in decentralization and on-chain innovation. If you want to see the future of digital assets, this is the episode.

programme.title: Welcome to AI for Everyone: No Tech Skills Needed
programme.desc: Welcome to the very first episode of AI for Everyone Show! If you’ve ever been curious about artificial intelligence but felt overwhelmed by all the jargon and hype — this podcast is for you.

programme.title: Why I Stopped Googling: How AI Replaces Search Engines
programme.desc: We’ve all been there: You Google something simple… and end up lost in a maze of ads, popups, sponsored content, and outdated blog posts. What should have taken 30 seconds turns into a 10-minute scavenger hunt. In this episode, I share why I’ve all but stopped using search engines — and how artificial intelligence, specifically tools like ChatGPT, have become my go-to for finding fast, accurate, and personalized answers. This isn’t just a tech upgrade. It’s a shift in how we interact with information. No links. No scrolling. Just useful answers, tailored to you.

programme.desc: The second showdown sees riders pushing harder—one contender emerges with a strong charge to the front, closing the championship gap.

programme.title: 24h Series
programme.desc: The Dubai 24 Hour Race is both a sports car and touring car automobile endurance race held annually at the Dubai Autodrome in Dubai, UAE.

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Mission Mini Cup
programme.desc: The Mission Mini Cup by Motul National Championship is the beginning of a journey for aspiring young motorcycle road racers.

programme.title: British Mini Bikes
programme.desc: British Mini Bikes has grown into Britains biggest and best championship for racing all forms of Mini bikes on tarmac surfaces.

programme.title: iRacing
programme.desc: Tthe ultimate simulated driving experience. From NASCAR to F1, Rally to Drifting, Sim Racing has it all!

programme.title: Paper Power
programme.desc: The theme of this episode is paper power. First, Angela Wolf has a technique for altering your pattern for leggings to add pockets. Then, Joe Vecchiarelli has lesson two as he creates a paper pattern from the bodice he draped during the previous episode.

programme.title: New Looks
programme.desc: Make the ordinary extraordinary. DIY fashion expert Jane Monzures embellishes plain shirts and makes accessories with zippers. Sewing instructor Joanne Banko makes an elegant padded hanger to keep clothes looking great. Designer Jessica Stewart uses collage design concepts to mash up patterns and colors for beautiful kids fashions.

programme.title: The Color Story Begins with Birthstones
programme.desc: Start a color story with birthstones. Blogger and jewelry-maker Molly Schaller finds inspiration and meaning in birthstone colors. She also shares some great gift packaging ideas for those special jewelry gifts. Katie uses leather belting lace and crystal charms to make box braid bracelets in her Beading Lesson.

programme.title: A Breath of Fresh Air
programme.desc: Sometime all we need is a walk outside to jump start our creativity. A simple breath of fresh air clears our head and allows to ideas to form. Nature all by itself is inspiring. Today Nealay Patel uses the branches of a tree to prompt a design for a necklace. Then leaves motivate Candie Cooper to create fringed leather leaf earrings. Finally, Tammy Honaman has peyote with a twist.

programme.title: Different Materials
programme.desc: New materials are the spice to your scrapbook soup. Every dish needs a little dash of pepper to add some flavor. It'sthe same with scrapbooking - bland is not very interesting. Fill in the spaces of your letters with paper on the "attitudes in generosity" page, build on a core to add dimension with Stacey Caron for a cherished layout, and projects featuring paper, acetate and glass from Sara Naumann; a spicy mix today on Scrapbook Soup.

programme.title: Episode 4: Fresh New Day
programme.desc: Each and every morning is our chance to re-invent our creativity. At the start of the show, Host Julie Fei Fan Balzer demonstrates a sewn book binding technique. Then, take a new look at the night sky with Cheryl Holtz. Finally, Rita Pano adds stamping to premade shapes to create dangles for drink stirrers

programme.title: The Knitting Circle Presented by CraftsyTV
programme.desc: Learn to knit, step-by-step with The Knitting Circle experts on CraftsyTV.

programme.title: The Midnight Quilt Show
programme.desc: Say hello to The Midnight Quilt Show, a series that celebrates late-night stitches, taking shortcuts and sewing in your PJs! Each week, host Angela Walters will bring you a quick and quippy breakdown of a brand new quilt… wine not included.

programme.title: Auschwitz-F?rstengrube
programme.desc: Join Polish Historian, Genealogist and Guide Dr. Tomasz Cebulski on an aerial and walking tour exploring Auschwitz-F?rstengrube, a large subcamp transformed into a forced labor camp for coal mining and construction of a new mine.

programme.title: Davidson Basketball Visits Auschwitz
programme.desc: Over Summer Break, the Davidson College Men's Basketball Team tours the Auschwitz Concentration Camp with a Holocaust Survivor Eva Kor, who with her twin sister was subjected to barbaric medical experiments by Auschwitz Dr. Josef Mengele.

programme.title: Healing Ink: Tattoing Over The Scars of October 7t
programme.desc: The non-profit "Healing Ink" brings together tattoo artists from the U.S and Israel, and tattoos over the scars of 129 Nova Music Festival survivors, injured IDF soldiers, and victims and families of the October 7th massacre and war with Hamas.

programme.title: Still There
programme.desc: Sapir College presents an animated anthology exploring Israeli students' experiences of October 7th. Through diverse animation styles, the students process their trauma, search for meaning, and attempt to chart a path forward.

programme.title: J Docs Presents Sabotage
programme.desc: Discovering female resistance in Auschwitz-Birkenau through the eyes of the youngest member of the resistance, exploring the women's underground operation, their heroism, and tragedy.

programme.title: Auschwitz-F?rstengrube

programme.title: The Slumber Party Massacre
programme.desc: Dark Rewind is a nostalgic TV series where August Kyss, a charismatic and quirky host, transports viewers back to 1984 as she dives into classic 80s horror films from the comfort of her neon-lit bedroom. The show blends campy humor, insightful commentary, and a love for all things horror. Each episode celebrates the iconic films, cheesy tropes, and retro culture that defined 80s horror, creating a time capsule of terror and fun for fans old and new.

The show blends campy humor, insightful commentary, and a love for all things horror. Each episode celebrates the iconic films, cheesy tropes, and retro culture that defined 80s horror, creating a time capsule of terror and fun for fans old and new.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 6
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. Though her landlady Sargunam is formidable, she wishes to destroy Kalivardhan.

programme.title: Interview with DJ Black
programme.desc: Welcome to Tele Vikatan, your one-stop destination for everything television! Get ready to immerse yourself in the captivating world of TV shows, exclusive interviews, soap opera reviews, and more. Our dedicated team is here to bring you the latest updates and behind-the-scenes insights from the exciting realm of television. Discover the thrill of your favorite television dramas as we delve into their gripping storylines and unforgettable characters. Join us as we go beyond the screen to explore the lives of your beloved TV stars through exclusive interviews, where they share their experiences, anecdotes, and behind-the-scenes stories. At Tele Vikatan, we are passionate about delivering high-quality content that caters to the diverse tastes and interests of our viewers. Whether youre a fan of heartwarming family dramas, thrilling mysteries, or gripping romance, we have something for everyone. We provide you with informative and entertaining videos that enhance your TV viewing experience. With Tele Vikatan, youll never miss a moment of the television magic.

programme.title: Deivamagal Episode 14
programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. It was broadcast on Sun TV initially from Monday to Friday and later extended to Saturday at 8 PM from 25 March 2013 to 17 February 2018 for 1,466 episodes. The show replaced S. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. This serial was shot in Pollachi, Chennai, Chengalpet, Hyderabad, Kerala, Puducherry, and Cuddalore. This is the first TV serial shot in the Bay of Bengal Plot Prakash his wife Sathyapriya and his eldest sister-in-law Gayathris conspiracies against their families to conquer Prakshs ancestral property Jai Hind Vilas.

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: AWARD PE AWARD
programme.desc: A local committee makes a surprise visit to hotel Kelifornia and presents Chai Raja with the Best Chef Award. Chai Raja is thrilled and places the award on the shelf and gives the duty of safe-guarding it to Sundar. And suddenly Basha develops a fascination for the trophy. Instantly, poor Sundars life turns into living hell. Things reach a crazy climax when the trophy from Sundars hands falls on the ground and breaks into a hundred pieces right in front of Chai Rajas eyes. Chai Raja is literally shivering in fury, Sundar is literally shivering in fear and Basha is literally shivering trying to control his laughter. And that very moment the local committee comes again with a larger trophy. A surprised Chai Raja gracefully takes a bow to accept yet another award. But to everyones sheer shock, the committee gives the trophy to Sundar for being the best waiter. And Chai Raja and Basha faint instantly...followed by Sundar!!!

programme.title: Shapeshifter
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Meep Meep Charlies
programme.desc: Boris and Sandy are fighting over the water sprayer and drenching Uncle Charlie with it. This leaves Charlie with no choice but to call on Deedee’s magic. Deedee finds a spell to make friendship dust as the perfect solution. Whoever the dust falls on will be best friends with whoever they see first. Happy for getting the magic powder they all set off to see Boris and Sandy. But on the way the Doobydoos rush at them so suddenly that they fall all over them and the Doobydoos become friends of Charlie and carry him off. Nino tries to explain the situation to Deedee, but she is too busy to listen. Back over at Charlie’s, the Doobydoos are treating him as a king and tries to run away from his new friends. Deedee finds some of the missing magic powder but tries to find Charlie. Deedee tries to bring things back to normal with magic, but Nino is against it. They find a way to get the twins to work together and splash the Doobydoos with water and wash off the friendship dust. The twins are friends again even though Deedee’s magic didn’t work as expected.

programme.title: The Big Cleanup!
programme.desc: It’s a messy affair. Floors covered with mud, walls with cake splattered and filth in every nook and cranny. Don sweeps, mops, vacuums and leaves the house sparkling new but when he returns back after throwing the trash, the house is again bombarded with dirt! This goes on till Don and Colonel pack their bags and decide to leave the house. Will they ever return?

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: ALLY-GATOR
programme.desc: Once a spooky-looking biologist comes to the teashop to have tea. He opens a box and starts doing some things into it (arranging eggs, or feathers or studying specimens). He is also having his tea. Once he finishes the drink, the old man leaves. But Sundar notices a thing fall from his box. By the time Sundar runs to the door, the man is gone. The thing looks like a shiny stone. Sundar is about to add the stone to his box of trinkets when Basha swoops in and snatches the box away. Sundar chases after Basha and they collide and the box flies open and the shiny stone falls out. Much to Sundars wonder (as well as Basha who sneaks up), the stone starts to crack. It is actually an egg. It cracks open and out pops a mischievous little alligator who gets a giggle out of messingg with the customers. The baby-alligator is literally after Sundar calling him Mama. A thunderous Chai Raja orders Sundar to get his alligator under control- which is made even more impossible thanks to Bashas meddling. But the twist happens when the baby-dragon starts calling Basha Papa! The shop looks straight out of a disastrous war movie when much to Sundars and Bashas relief, the absent minded biologist turns up and in a trice, tames the naughty alligator. But all doesnt end well as Sundars single sigh of relief is all that it takes to bring down the teetering shop to a pile of wood and leaves!

programme.title: CAKE PE CHAI
programme.desc: Its Poodles birthday today and Sundar has planned to prepare the perfect cake for poodle Aaloo Paratha Cake with Chai Frosting but he has to do this while he is also taking care of the Hotel Californias demanding customers. And Chai Raja should not find this out. Ingredients are in place, Sundar is ready to bake and Basha is also ready with a surprise for sundar which is making sure that the cake is never baked. Will the cake be baked?

programme.title: What CeCe Saw
programme.desc: Upon discovering the Creepy Candy TM fooling around in his secret laboratory again, Victor crams them into his lunchbox. Soon after, he bumps into CeCe OMalley, the new girl at school, and their lunchboxes accidently get switched. Once Victor realizes this He chases after CeCe to keep her from opening the lunchbox.Can Victor get to her in time before she opens the lunchbox? Can he stop her from discovering his secret about the Creepy Candy TM? Will Cece learn about the other creepy secrets the old library holds?

programme.title: Two Tickets.
programme.desc: When Gummy wins two tickets to a big dance show, each of his best pals vie to be the one he gives the coveted second ticket to.

programme.title: MOUSE TRAP
programme.desc: Business is a bit slow at the tea shop and Chai Raja tries churning up new inventive snacks to entice in the customers. The overworked Sundar can only salivate at the sight of the overflowing platters of food and zealously guards them from Basha. It takes all of Sundars self-control not to sample even a fallen fritter/vada. Chai Raja meanwhile opens his larder to take some more flour when much to his shock, he sees a small tail flick out of sight. Mice!! Chai Raja immediately sets Sundar the task of getting rid of them. Sundar after some paw-snapped agony manages to rig a mousetrap and sets it to catch the scurrying culprit. He waits all night and finally dozes off when he is awakened by the snap of the trap. Sundar victoriously marches only to find in the trap, a baby mouse in a diaper. The little tyke of a rodent wails so piteously that Sundar, after some stern admonishing, ushers out of the shop and signals that he should not return. Next morning , business is brisk and Sundar rushes about to wait on customers when he hears a shriek. The lady customer points and much to his shock Sundar sees the diaper-mouse scurry with fritters. Sundar gets an earful from Chai Raja for not completing his task. The wily Basha meanwhile ferrets out the baby mouse and surprises it as it steals the next time- but Basha too is charmed by the baby mouse and ends up showing it his secret stash of fritters. The baby mouse acts as in complete awe of Basha and wants to be his crony.Basha is thrilled and starts tutoring the baby mouse in the art of stealing fritters. The baby mouse goes one step further and uses his big baby eyes each time Sundar catches him- one long wide-eyed pleading look and Sundars heart melts. Both Sundar and Basha think that they will be the mentor to the baby mouse who however is quite a prankster.

programme.title: DOG DANGER
programme.desc: Practicing her Warrior Transformation, April gets stuck as a panther. Using a newly discovered elevator, Negu sends a big Mutant Dog up to chase April’s cat. Pai and Xia manage to train the dog, having it fetch Pai’s stick and rewarding it with delicious mushrooms.

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: Mess at Museum
programme.desc: Dunky takes Keet and Cat to the towns museum which is inside a home to a lot of precious artifacts.

programme.title: Money In The Bank
programme.desc: Money money money! Dons safe is full of money. And colonel suggests to put the money in bank. But, Charly Marly and Larry want to become rich!!! and they will just not let go of the money. It is pandemonium in the house and the bank. Bang bang bang!

programme.title: Prince Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy discovers that he may be next in line to the throne of a tiny faraway country – and he takes a crash-course in ‘how to be royal’... with ‘crash’ being the key word!

programme.title: Universal Remote
programme.desc: A mishap with electricity converts Colonel into a remote controlled dog. And Charly, Marly and Larry exploit the situation to the maximum, making poor Colonel their remote controlled puppet. But nothing is forever, now it is time the trio came into Colonel’s shoes bu ha ha ha…

programme.title: Misadventure
programme.desc: The painter inside Don has woken and he must have his painting on the wall. But the rats are ready even to turn the world upside down to stop Don from fulfilling his dream. And you can imagine what will follow. But whatever happens in between, it is all a sweet happy ending.

programme.title: Slimey Smlugs
programme.desc: Sneevils newest pet Smlugs are destroying all of the plumbing in Smightyland. The Super Six must smlug drive them out before its too late.

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Christmas Ring Ring
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: Drill Bit
programme.desc: One day as the shop opens, Sundar sees a well-built fireman perform a fire drill for a small bunch of kids just outside the shop. Thoroughly in awe, Sundar wants to become a firefighter and much to Chai Rajas consternation, Sundar starts converting all his chores about the shop into fire-fighter training drills. Customers and Chai Raja go crazy as Sundar becomes over- zealous about becoming a fireman. However he is extremely clumsy and not to forget Basha who manages to make this training even more nerve-wracking for Chai Raja and the customers with his naughty pranks. There may be no fire but Chai Raja will surely conk out of heartburn if Sundar doesnt quickly end his training and resume waiting.

programme.title: Three's A Pain
programme.desc: When Pancake, Odessa, and Maple end up getting into a tiff over some colored chalk they’re using to draw pictures with, they ALL wind up in the Zooniverse at the same time that night! Sharing is caring. / Teamwork is the way.

programme.title: Money Problems
programme.desc: Speed and his friends have succeeded in acquiring the missing part from the Shadow Organization, but upon trying to make it work with the Mach 6, they are thrust into an alternate reality where the Shadowy Organization is in charge. They must return the part to where they found it, in Shadowy Org HQ, in order to get back to the present. Now that theyve had a glimpse of the Shadowy org.s master plan, they know what they have to do to stop them.

programme.title: BABY POX
programme.desc: Everyone but Pai catches a pox that makes you act like a baby. He has to sail the Lord of the Wind by himself to get a mushroom for the cure, all while caring for the “babies.” Negu sends a huge Mutant Toad. Luckily, the toad catches the Baby Pox, too!

programme.title: The Wrestler
programme.desc: Cat notices that Katreena is a big fan of “macho man” a well built super star .He needs to build his physique and impress her.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: Fly Away Nino
programme.desc: Nino and Mewmew are making paper planes, but as Mewmew didn’t follow all the instructions Nino’s flies so well and much farther. And not just Nino, the twins too have fun seeing their planes fly so well. But no matter how much Mewmew tries it doesn’t fly like the planes of the others. Mewmew wishes her planes flew too so she asks Deedee to work some magic for her. So Deedee casts an ‘all day flying’ spell onto Mewmew’s plane but Nino comes in-between and gets hit by the spell on his helmet. Now Nino can’t stop flying and zooms away all over Abra-Dabra. He flies so wildly that he send Mayor De Pfeffle for a spin after knocking over his flower display. Nino is sorry for being so carried away that he tries to land, but to his surprise the helmet keeps pulling him skyward. Charlie tries weighing Nino down with his heavy mail bag, but the helmet is too strong for even Charlie to grab a hold of that Nino is flung away higher and farther. Nino promises to deliver the mail, much to the happiness of Charlie who can get a much deserved nap for all the effort. So begins Abra-Dabra’s very own first ‘air’-mail courtesy of Nino. Deedee comes up with a plan to help the ‘jet-lagged’ Nino after being inspired by the paper planes Mewmew makes. She shouts out to Nino to use a long sheet of paper from the mail bag and make a plane ‘Mewmew style’ with the wings pointing downwards. The plan works and Nino is able to fly right into Mewmew’s house and the magic wears-off as the sun sets in Abra-Dabra. In all the fuss Mewmew understands what made her planes not to fly, which actually helped Nino come down, and makes her paper planes fly so well now, thanks to Deedee.

programme.title: Day At The Spa
programme.desc: Don and Colonel want to pamper themselves. Yes!! a complete spa treatment. And when Larry Marly and Charly enter the scene, spa becomes a punishment for Don and Colonel. But when they are at their wits end, the dogs make sure that, the naughty rats learn a lesson. How does the twist happen??

programme.title: Atchoo!
programme.desc: The Guardians meet a very cute mutant with a terrible cold. They decide to adopt it and name it Atchoo. When the Guardians see that the gates of the Magic Fort standing open, they think Atchoo has betrayed them. But in fact, Atchoo has been captured by Amkko and Koto, who wanted to get Negu’s defective mutant back again. The Guardians free their friend and discover that the only ones at the Magic Fort were the Wise Elders, doing a spot of cleaning.

programme.title: Rewind Wand
programme.desc: Nino and Deedee are out for a stroll and hear a familiar snore. Seeing postman Charlie taking a nap, they make a pillow with stones for Charlie to help him nap better. Just then Mewmew bumps into them with a jammed roller skate stuck to his leg. Deedee wants to help but she doesn’t have her magic wand, so rushes off home to get it. En route Tiggy needs help with his whisk that isn’t working and he needs to finish whisking a large batch of cupcakes. This makes Deedee rush along faster. On the way she sees the Doobydoos stuck up a rock crying out for help. She really needs her wand to help everyone, but she cannot even find the wand in her home. Nino and Deedee run out to trace their steps back along with the twins and Charlie’s hammock. Nino and Deedee use the hammock as a safety net to get the Doobydoos down from the rock. With all the Doobydoos, he helps Tiggy by presenting him with an army of whiskers. Having the work all done, Deedee takes a bowl of lemon icing to pour into Mewmew’s rollerblade shoes, and it easily comes loose. All of the rescued and helped friends of Deedee muster up to find her magic wand. Charlie sleepily walks in scratching his back, complaining of something poking him all the time during his nap, which turned out to be Deedee’s wand! Everyone’s in for a treat of freshly baked cupcakes. It certainly turned out to be an exciting non-magic day but with the magical power of friendship

programme.title: Roller-Skates.
programme.desc: Gummy decides to take up roller-skating – and everybody else’s world winds up being turned upside-down.

programme.title: KING SCUMWORM
programme.desc: Peng’s carelessness leads to the Ninjas fighting their way out of the nest of a huge (but dopey) parasitic monarch.

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Sing us back home
programme.desc: a panda steals Ragoo’s bamboo stick. She flees through the trees and the twins chase him, so they all end up lost

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Gummy and his pals all head off camping, with comedy and disaster joining them every step of the way!

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Rich eccentric Grumpy McCrab launches a contest with a huge prize for whoever can go longest without laughing, smiling, singing or dancing. Miraculously, Gummy winds up among the finalists..

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: A Packet of Gummy
programme.desc: Gummy, Kala and Harry get caught up in an escalating competition to get the whole collection of cereal box ‘free surprises’ – with each of them only missing the super-rare little plastic unicorn.

programme.title: The Low Price of Fame
programme.desc: Team Racing is introduced. Speed, X and Annalise are on one team. When Analise is made team captain they must get over their differences for the good of the team. Before the race Annalise is contacted by the Shadowy woman who tells her that a saboteur will enter the race and attack the Mach 6. She orders Annalise to aid the saboteur. It seems like Annalise might but at the last moment takes the hit and saves Speed and the Mach 6. While investigating where the saboteur came from, Speed and the gang discover a tear in the virtual track. The saboteurs got in through the tear, which leaves the school vulnerable to attack. Conor patches the tear but they have to find the source. Since the virtual track is temporarily closed the Racer Academy is invited to race at the Alpha Academy. Tipped off by Speed Sr., Speed and Conor investigate and find the source of the virtual tear. They chalk it up to competitive sabotoge, but we find out that the Alpha Academy is connected to the Shadowy Organization.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Speed decides its time for an all out assault on the Shadowy Organization. They manage to get the part back, but in the process Speed Sr. is captured. The kids have to save dad and eventually do, but they discover that Speed and Xs mom is Trixie, leader of the Shadowy org

programme.title: Marco's Garden
programme.desc: The neighboring dog Moti is very fussy about his Garden of the house and takes his job seriously to guard it.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: A Slice Of Fun
programme.desc: Ding Dong. It’s the pizza delivery boy. Don pays the cash and open’s the box to find only leftover olives and baby corn! Sad and dejected, he decides to make his own pizza, but is tricked by Lary Marly and Charly as always!

programme.title: Boredom Blues
programme.desc: Brains is bored. Fred helps her find something new to do, and she falls in love with tennis! While she’s away, Fred opens a box of what he thinks are toys, but are actually a real army of small alien ships, which fly around attacking the lab. Brains combats them in a tennis racquet battle to the finish.

programme.title: GET THAT GLOVE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to guard the Glove of the North in the Magic Fort. Amkko and Koto attack the fort with a Rock-Eating Mutant. The Guardians manage (eventually) to transform into the Dragon, Panther, and Rodent Warriors to drive them off.

programme.title: Captain Blackbeard – Little Mermaid Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the story of “The Little Mermaid” by Hans Christian Andersen, having been called out by a Turtle-Doctor, who is attending to NEPTUNE, the king of the seas. The LITTLE MERMAID, the monarch’s youngest daughter, has mysteriously disappeared. NEPTUNE is very sad and his health is in danger. SANDRA and FO will carry out an in-depth investigation, discovering that everything forms part of a plan by the SEA WITCH. The evil villain of the ocean depths has summoned up the perfidious monsters of the sea, in order to gain power over all the oceans.

programme.title: Mood Music
programme.desc: Deedee and Nino hear the most horrible sounds ever and run out to find Mewmew playing his violin. And to top it off he’s inviting everyone to hear him play at the concert. Deedee encourages Mewmew along, but everyone turns her down after hearing what Mewmew plays. Tiggy throws a shoe at Mewmew mistaking the music for cats screeching, even the Doobydoos scram. Tika Pila is also enraged that Mewmew walks away so dejected. Deedee weaves a spell that makes the violin plays with so much emotion that Nino sheds a tear. Now Mewmew has to muster her spirit and prove to all of Abra-Dabra that she can really play well. First stop is at Tiggy’s, and when Mewmew plays a melancholic tune, Tiggy cries so much that Mewmew walks away sadly. The Doobydoos cry as well to the point that Mewmew totally hates what Deedee has conjured. Deedee and Nino notice that Mewmew’s violin plays according to the state of Mewmew’s emotions. Deedee and Nino devise a plan and Nino keeps Mewmew happy and practising while Deedee rounds up the townsfolk to attend the concert. Charlie goes to get the twins, but takes a quick nap instead. Though all take a while to come, Deedee and Nino lift Mewmew’s spirits so high that the entire town come rushing to the concert on hearing the joyful music Mewmew is playing. And even thought the magic spell wears off, the town still encourage Mewmew to keep on playing, for she had already proved the very best to all of them.

programme.title: Katreena the Cat
programme.desc: There’s a new hot kitten called katreena ,’Kitty’ in short, has just come visiting her friend Dunky. She is so hot that Cat will do anything to just be with her.

programme.title: Tommy’s Got Talent
programme.desc: Charlie and the twins are practising for Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest. Deedee isn’t contesting as she didn’t get any time to practice. The twins have a tough time dancing in step with Uncle Charlie’s drum beat. Deedee tries to help them with a remembering spell, but Nino points out that it wouldn’t be fair to use magic in a contest. So Deedee and Nino walk along wishing the twins are able to perfect their act in time. Mewmew si struggling with a juggling act, so Deedee tries to help by conjuring a catching spell, but Nino reminds her it’s wrong just in time. Luciano haughtily sings as he walks. But Deedee and Nino hear an even more beautiful tune emanating from Tommy Prickles house. But Tommy is not too confident to sing in the presence of others. So Deedee comes up with a non-magic way to help. Happy at what Deedee suggests, Tommy decides to enroll. The fabulous prize is Tiggy’s very own specially made jelly. The winner is decided by who gets the highest ovation as measured on the clap-o-meter. Charlie and the twins perform outstandingly, so does Mewmew the juggling rabbit, Luciano’s opera all of whom get loud ovations. Finally it is Tommy prickles turn, but he isn’t able to keep his eyes closed like Deedee suggested him to, making his singing come to an abrupt stop. Deedee asks the audience if they could close their eyes to help Tommy sing. That was all Tommy needed to sing so very melodiously. The clap-o-meter does a full spin and points to the highest score ever. Tommy is declared the winner of Mayor De Pfeffle’s talent contest, that too without magic a wee bit.

programme.title: Once Upon a Time Part 2
programme.desc: After accidentally landing Aladdin in jail, Jamillah comes up with a brilliant plan to break him out. Dressed as a guard, Jamillah approaches the cell and confidently tells the dozy guard that he is dismissed. Her confidence confuses him and she and Genie get Aladdin out. Aladdin cant believe he has a genie and races off shouting joyfully to all of Baghdad.

programme.title: The Secret Book – Sleeping Beauty Case 2
programme.desc: Sandra and her assistant, Fo, travel into the story of “The Sleeping Beauty”, having been called out by the three good fairies. The Prince has been turned to stone by a mysterious spell, just when he was about to reach the castle, where he would kiss her, thus waking her up. The three fairies have tried to break the spell with their magic wands, but to no avail. Sandra will soon discover that the culprit is the Evil Fairy, who gets her spells from a secret book. Only if they can get hold of that book will the three fairies be able to bring the Prince back to life. Plucking up all their courage, Sandra and Fo will enter the evil fairy’s sinister castle in search of the mysterious secret book.

programme.title: SCHOOL’S OUT!
programme.desc: When the Elders sail off to play Bingo, Pai and Xia say it’s party time! They get April to dance, but she loses her fan, which falls down to the Chou World. Amkko and Koto use it to fly up to the Yan World on the giant mutant chicken. While April distracts the mutants with tango lessons, Xia and Pai send the chicken packing.

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: The Forest Without Magic – Rapunzel
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant FO travel into the tale of RAPUNZEL, having been called out by RAPUNZEL herself. She can’t stand being locked up in the tower for a moment longer; she wants to discover the world and escape from the clutches of the odious WITCH once and for all. The Detective and her assistant help RAPUNZEL to escape from the tower, but the WITCH soon finds out that she has gone and sets off in hot pursuit. The WITCH is much more powerful than SANDRA had originally imagined and there is only one way for SANDRA, FO and RAPUNZEL to get out of this adventure alive: to reach the Forest Without Magic.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: The Talking Treasure Bird
programme.desc: A traveller comes into town with a special bird that can lead them to treasure which Aladdin desperately wants but cant afford. Jamillah arrives and offers 5 gold chocolate coins which the traveller gladly accepts. They take him home and try to make him talk, calling upon Genie to help out. They succeed but the bird is only interested in worms not treasure although he gives them a riddle to help them find it. After a mad dash through the market they find it only to discover that treasure doesnt mean the same thing to everyone!

programme.title: Beggar for a Day
programme.desc: Jamillah and Aladdin meet a beggar in Baghdad. He gives them a emerald ring to take care of. Convinced he is a thief, Genie and Aladdin try to convince Jamillah to hand the ring in. There might be a reward! Jamillah isnt easily convinced and goes to others for help. They ask local wise man Akbar who convinces them to let him take care of it, only to run off with the ring himself. With Genies help they track Akbar the thief down and Jamillah is rewarded when the beggar returns and reveals himself to be the sultan!

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: The New Fred
programme.desc: After Fred clumsily insults Nora, he commands Friday to do his talking for him, transforming into a neck piece Fred wears, imitating his voice, and giving him a shock when he tries to speak for himself. Friday’s bold personality rehabilitates Fred’s reputation, until he short circuits and starts insulting everyone.

programme.title: Follow The Leader
programme.desc: Duda and his friends are in the Pinkar Choir. Duda seems a little deaf, so Dada suggests that he directs instead. On the day of his last rehearsal, before the concert, Duda is waiting for his friends. He goes to find them and tries to get them to come to rehearsal, but they all seem busy with other things. Duda gets upset because no one listens to him. So he tells Scot to be the director. At first, Scot is ecstatic; However, after hearing Duda sing, he begs him to continue directing and even gives him a magic conductors baton. Is the magic baton really magic? And will he make everyone listen to Doubt?

programme.title: Kidnap Mayhem

programme.title: Super Dad
programme.desc: "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the "Xu Wei Hao (Thomas Ong) and Li Zheng Yi (Jeremy Chan) are neighbours who share one thing in common, both men are looked down upon by their wives and children. They receive a mysterious box of chocolates one day, thinking it was a mistake by the post office, Wei Hao and Zheng Yi each took a piece of the chocolate. Zheng Yi, once a cowardly policeman, suddenly possesses superb ability in solving a crime. While Wei Hao regains the respect of his daughter by saving her when she fell from a building. Chen Kai (Chen Han Wei), the ex-husband of Zheng Yi’s wife, was released from jail and tries to seek forgiveness. Seeing his sincerity in turning over a new leaf, Zheng Yi took him in. He accidentally took a piece of the chocolate and discovers its super power. The trio starts to rely on the chocolate every time they needed its super power to solve problems, making them the Super Dad in their children’s eyes. One day, the three fathers see their own children in danger, but there is only one piece of chocolate left. Will they fight to see who gets the last piece of chocolate or will they count on their own will to save their children?" in their children’s eyes. programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: A Spanish Twist 1932
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry (the human versions, not the cat and mouse) are on a raft in the ocean. After being attacked by an octopus and losing their raft, they wash up on the shores of Spain. After harassing the waitresses at a local sidewalk café, they insult the owner and wind up in a bull ring as punishment. In the midst of fighting dozens of bulls, they receive a telegram that Prohibition has been repealed back in the U.S. They immediately leave Spain headed back to the U.S. for a drink

programme.title: Quack a Doodle Doo 1950
programme.desc: His Mama is the only one who love Baby Huey, an overgrown clumsy ugly duckling. The other Mamas and their broods shun him like the plague and make his little life miserable. But when a ferocious fox attacks the barnyard, Huey comes to the rescue of one and all. Huey is a hero basking in his new-found popularity. First of the series.

programme.title: Birth of a Notion 1947
programme.desc: Daffy Duck cons a dog named Leopold into offering him a stay in his house, but he has to hide Daffy from his master, a Peter-Lorre style mad scientist who needs a duck's wishbone.

programme.title: It's Hummer Time 1950
programme.desc: A cat chases a hummingbird and repeatedly stumbles onto the property of a sleepy bulldog, who punishes the cat for each interruption of his slumber.

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp- 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: Private Snafu - Fighting Tools -1943
programme.desc: Private Snafu

programme.title: Jungle Drums 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple.

programme.title: Parlez Vous Woo 1956
programme.desc: Olive is so captived by "The International", a radio personality with a French accent, that she'd rather stay home than go out on a date with Popeye. Bluto, overhearing this, comes to the door as the character. Popeye does his best to get Olive back, to no avail. Finally, Bluto challenges Popeye to a duel, ultimately stabbing him in the chest where his can of spinach was. Popeye unmasks Bluto, then eats another can of spinach to give himself a French accent.

programme.title: Pepe le-Pew - Heaven Scent 1956
programme.desc: On the French Riviera, a female cat is frightened by sudden outbursts of barking by every dog around her. So, to scare them away, she paints her back with a white stripe like that of a skunk. The dogs, on seeing her stripe, run away and hide in fright. But she doesn't receive the peace she'd expected, because Pepe Le Pew, the amorous French skunk, sees her, thinks she's a girl skunk, and tries to make love to her.

programme.title: A Date to Skate 1938
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: A Cartoonist's Nightmare 1935
programme.desc: A cartoonist falls victim to the very villains he has drawn. It's up to Beans the Cat to save the day.

programme.title: Wild Wife 1954
programme.desc: A harried housewife describes to her boorish husband what she did that day.

programme.title: The Mechanical Monsters 1941
programme.desc: Superman battles a criminal mastermind and his robot army.

programme.title: Cad and Caddy- 1947
programme.desc: Lulu plans her revenge against a distressed golfer who refuses to give her a lollipop after he promised her one for caddieing for him

programme.title: Crowing Pains 1947
programme.desc: Foghorn convinces Henery that Sylvester is a chicken. Foghorn sticks Henery in an egg and sticks it under Sylvester.

programme.title: Broom Stick Bunny 1956
programme.desc: Witch Hazel's claim to be the ugliest witch of all is threatened by a Halloween witch who turns out to be Bugs trick-or-treating.

programme.desc: Molly Moo-Cow and The Butterflies

programme.title: Me Musical Nephews 1942

And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

programme.title: In the Bag-1932

programme.title: The Gorilla 1939
programme.desc: When a wealthy man is threatened by a killer known as The Gorilla, he hires the Ritz Brothers to investigate. A real escaped gorilla shows up at the mansion just as the investigators arrive.

programme.title: My Favorite Brunette 1947
programme.desc: Shortly before his execution on the death row in San Quentin, amateur sleuth and baby photographer Ronnie Jackson, tells reporters how he got there

programme.title: Safety Last!1923

programme.title: The Littlest Angel 1969
programme.desc: In The Littlest Angel, the beloved holiday story comes to life in a touching musical special. Jerry Skinner stars as a small boy who enters heaven but struggles to fit in among the angels. Longing for the simple joys of his earthly life, he offers a humble gift that becomes the most treasured of all. With heartfelt songs, tender performances, and a timeless message of love and faith, this family favorite captures the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: The Night Before Christmas 1968
programme.desc: In The Night Before Christmas, the timeless holiday poem springs to life in a colorful animated retelling. As children nestle in their beds on Christmas Eve, Saint Nicholas arrives with his sleigh full of toys, spreading joy and wonder with every step. With warm narration, festive music, and charming animation, this family favorite captures the magic and spirit of Clement Clarke Moore’s classic tale, making it a cherished Christmas tradition on screen.

programme.title: Night Of The Living Dead
programme.desc: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the Northeast of the United States.

programme.title: Corregidor
programme.desc: A doctor and his staff in a hospital on the Philippine island of Corregidor shortly after the Japanese attack on Pearl Harbor try to treat the sick, injured and wounded as American and Filipino troops desperately try to beat back a ferocious Japanese attack.

programme.title: Alias John Law
programme.desc: John Clark and his deaf pal, Bootch Collum (Buck Connors), are trailed by U. S. Marshal Lamar Bly , who thinks they are part of The Kootney Kid's (Earl Dwire) gang, which had just held up the stage coach. But the gang attacks the pair, and Bly joins them in the gunfight.

programme.title: A Quiet Place To Kill
programme.desc: A disillusioned race-car driver plots to kill her ex-husband at the behest of his new wife, but the plan quickly goes awry.

programme.title: Raiders of Old California (1957)
programme.desc: At the end of the Mexican-American War, a crooked U.S. Cavalry Captain and his men force a captive Mexican officer to sign the deeds to his vast lands and large hacienda over to the Captain.

programme.title: Arizona
programme.desc: Perrin is a cowboy who comes to the aid of local Indians being swindled out of their gold. He signs on as a ranch foreman, but learns the ranch is the home of the crooks.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: A rookie in the police force must engage in a cat-and-mouse game with a pistol-wielding psychopath who becomes obsessed with her.

programme.title: Romance on the Range 1942
programme.desc: Roy Rogers brings song and spirit to Romance on the Range! When cattle rustlers stir up trouble on the frontier, Roy saddles up to protect the ranchers and bring the outlaws to justice. Along the way, his courage and charm win more than just gunfights, as romance blossoms under the wide-open skies. With the Sons of the Pioneers providing harmony and plenty of action on the trail, this Western blends music, adventure, and heart in true Roy Rogers style.

programme.title: In Old Caliente
programme.desc: Americans come West to California in the hope of peaceful settlement.

programme.title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
programme.desc: An American journalist returns to Paris - a city that gave him true love and deep grief.

programme.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
programme.desc: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

programme.title: Captian Kidd (1945) Colorized
programme.desc: The unhistorical adventures of pirate Captain Kidd revolve around treasure and treachery.

programme.title: Death Machines
programme.desc: An evil Dragon Lady injects three martial arts fighters with a serum that turns them into zombie-like assassins.

programme.title: A Hero's Tears
programme.desc: Fu Sheng must retain the teardrop sword to keep his father alive

programme.title: Four Shaolin Challengers
programme.desc: Lin Che Jong, a former student of Wong Fei Hung, is a hawker in a small town. Whe he stands up to gangsters from the local crime family, his fellow hawkers and business folk encourage and help him to open a Kung Fu school in town.

programme.title: Burn Rate
programme.desc: On this episode of Burn Rate, host Bryan Baiss takes a deep dive into the Julius Caesar cigar. Join Bryan as he rates and reviews this unique stick, highlighting its flavor profile, construction, and overall experience.

programme.title: Unrolled
programme.desc: Join us as we take a behind the scenes tour of Florida's largest independent tobacco farm. Jeff Borysiewicz guides us through his tobacco farm, sharing tricks of the trade and everything that goes into the process of producing high quality cigar tobacco.

programme.title: Behind the Blend
programme.desc: In this episode of Behind the Blend, Sean speaks with Jose Blanco from La Galera Cigars, a company with five generations of family history in tobacco farming and cigar manufacturing in the Dominican Republic. Jose discusses the company's core cigar lines, including the Connecticut, Habano, and San Andres Maduro, explaining how they are blended for full flavor rather than just strength and that the company's Connecticut blend helped them get on the map by challenging the notion that Connecticut wrappers lacked flavor. He also shares his vision for the company, focusing on promoting the humble and welcoming culture of cigar smoking, and talks about the challenge and reward of working alongside his father to carry on the family legacy.

programme.title: Privada Cigar Club
programme.desc: Join us as the Privada Cigar Club takes on PCA 2023! Dive into an exclusive behind-the-scenes look as we explore the premier event for cigar enthusiasts. From unveiling the latest cigar blends to networking with industry leaders, this video captures the essence of the PCA experience.

In Chicas Guapas, the audience can become a protagonist by voting weekly their favorite makeup and hair tutorials, contesting for tickets to exclusive events, meeting emerging designers & celebrities and exploring the trends of each season from the hand of our #EmbajadorasChicasGuapas . Chicas Guapas has more than 97 million monthly impressions. It was created and is directed by Lucía Ugarte, from Buenos Aires, Argentina.

programme.title: Argentina Fashion Week: Luxury Trends + Antigüedades + Ganadora CG Foundation | PROGRAMA COMPLETO
programme.desc:
Programa completo de #ChicasGuapasTV:
- Apertura de #argentinafashionweek con #luxurytrends : hablamos con Vero de la Canal, Jorge Rey, Mario Vidal, Nuria Bueno y Marcelo Senra. -Visitamos Daniel Miranda Antiques, una tienda con antigüedades de lujo que transcienden en el tiempo y elevan tus espacios. - Hablamos con la ganadora del Latina Seed Awards '23, el premio de #ChicasGuapasFoundation.

programme.desc: Starr Rocque and Yonathan Elias kick off the year sharing some of their goals and covering the hottest pop culture news, from the Grammys and the Oscars to Rihanna and the Super Bowl and everything in between.

programme.title: Guest Ebony McMorris
programme.desc: White House Correspondent Ebony McMorris for American Urban Radio Networks shares the inspirational story of how she became AURN's White House Correspondent, offers advice on how to make your dream a reality and position yourself to walk in your purpose.

programme.title: Guest Portia Allen-Kyle
programme.desc: Color Of Change's Portia Allen-Kyle discusses the organization's Black Tech Agenda for 2025.

programme.title: Guest Omar Dorsey

programme.desc: Derek Sarno shows us how to make tofu into a sassy, hipster dish.

programme.title: From Obese to Super Fit!
programme.desc: This is a journey millions of people want to take and can. Dropkick the weight-loss drugs now!

programme.title: Sleaford Mods' Vegan Musician
programme.desc: Andrew Fearn is a member of the popular and controversial UK band Sleaford Mods.

programme.title: Fascinating Fashionista!
programme.desc: Emma Hakansson is an ethical fashion leader who makes her case with captivating style!

programme.title: Give Me Shelter - Film
programme.desc: Celebrities are on a mission to save animals caught in the crosshairs of human arrogance and greed.

programme.title: S3E5 - Pinks All Out
programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!
